description: This course provides the basic professional knowledge and skills needed for successful entry into the field of modern language teaching. Through readings, class discussions, and active participation in teaching situations, students become familiar with both the theory and the practice of language teaching and are introduced to the issues faced by the profession at large in the beginning of the 21st century. Required field experience component. Prerequisite: Education 330. Offered annually in the Spring Semester.
name: Tchg of World Lang
prerequisites: Prerequisite: Education 330. Offered annually in the Spring Semester.
title: Teaching of World Languages, K-12
